DOCNAME: PROCHÁZKA AND PROCHÁZKOVÁ v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
TEXT: The applicants , Mr PERSON and PERSON , are NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicants are the owners of certain plots of land in ORG u NORP . In DATE they decided to build a family house with an education centre to be run within the framework of their business activity .

On DATE the applicants informed ORG of the town of ORG u Prahy ( odbor výstavby města ) of these plans . On DATE they applied to ORG ( PERSON úřad DATE stavební úřad ) for a building permit ( stavební povolení ) . According to the Government , on DATE the applicants requested the construction authority to be sent forms for the construction of a family house . They subsequently replaced this application with a request for a building permit . However , there is no proof that they actually applied for a building permit . ORG only dealt with the applicants ' request for planning permission ( územní rozhodnutí ) concerning the construction of a family house which they filed on DATE .

According to the Government , the planning proceedings ( řízení o vydání územního rozhodnutí ) started on DATE but were suspended on CARDINAL DATE when ORG invited the applicants to supplement their request for planning permission . The applicants stated that they received this invitation on DATE .

On DATE ORG decided , upon the applicants ' request of DATE , that CARDINAL of the applicants ' plots of land could be permanently withdrawn from agricultural use . On DATE it delivered a building permit for the construction of a drain connection .
On DATE the applicants modified their planning application .

On DATE they requested the GPE - East District Prosecutor ( okresní procurator ) to supervise the activities of ORG . It was found that they had not received the invitation of ORG of CARDINAL DATE . Upon the prosecutor 's order , the invitation was notified to them on DATE . According to the Government , the applicants did not supplement their request for planning permission as they had been invited to do so by ORG . They only asked for the reimbursement of CZK MONEY ( CARDINAL EUR ) in taxes for the permanent withdrawal from agricultural use which they had been obliged to pay .

Due to the length of the proceedings , the applicants allegedly suffered an important financial prejudice and , therefore , started the construction without a building permit . The Government stated that the applicants ' description of the relevant facts in this part of their application to the ORG was shortened and distorted .

On DATE ORG decided to demolish the applicants ' education centre as it had been built on agricultural land contrary to the existing territorial plans . On DATE the Prague - East District Office ( okresní úřad ) quashed this decision and sent the case back to ORG which , on DATE , again ordered the applicants to demolish their construction . The applicants appealed against this decision . At the same time , they sold the construction because of their difficult financial situation . On DATE the new owners were granted a building permit .

According to the Government , on DATE ORG decided to demolish the applicants ' family house as it had been built without a building permit . On DATE the building permit was granted , ORG having considered that the construction was not contrary to the public interest .

On DATE the GPE - East District Court ( obvodní soud ) stayed the proceedings on the applicants ' action for damages which they had introduced on DATE against the town of ORG . The court stated that the applicants had been invited ( at a hearing of DATE , according to the Government ) to supplement their claim by CARDINAL DATE , but failed to do so .

On DATE the applicants completed their action , the supplementary documents being notified to the court on DATE . On DATE they were informed that the first hearing would be held on DATE and that their completed action would be considered as a new action for damages .

On DATE they were informed that the hearing could not be held because the court file had been sent to ORG ( krajský soud ) which would deal with the applicants ' appeal of DATE against the decision of ORG on DATE . On DATE ORG quashed this decision and remitted the case to ORG which on DATE held a hearing and adjourned it until DATE . The applicants ' lawyer could not attend the hearing which had to be adjourned until DATE .
At a hearing held on DATE the applicants again supplemented their action and requested that GPE , represented by ORG ( PERSON hospodářství ) , to be added to the proceedings as a second defendant .
A hearing held on DATE was adjourned until DATE .
On DATE ORG granted the applicants ' request that GPE represented by ORG be added to the proceedings , and that the amount of damages be increased .
On DATE , DATE , CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL and DATE , ORG held further hearings .

On DATE the applicants submitted their final pleadings to the court which , on DATE , dismissed their action for damages . Having received the judgment on DATE , the applicants appealed on DATE , substantiating their appeal on DATE and completing it , according to the Government , on DATE .
On DATE the applicants challenged the judge of this court for bias . On DATE the judge admitted that she was biased .

On DATE ORG invited the applicants ' lawyer to specify whether she was still representing her clients and whether the appeal had been filed in the name of both of them or only in the name of the second applicant . She replied on DATE .
On DATE ORG rectified the verdict of its judgment of DATE . It further supplemented it on DATE .

On DATE ORG invited the applicants to specify , within DATE , whether their appeal contained a new point on the merits of their action for damages . The applicants ' lawyer answered on DATE . On DATE the court adjourned the proceedings without fixing the next hearing in order to decide on the extension of the applicants ' action for damages .

On DATE it quashed the judgment of ORG and remitted the case for further consideration . At the same time , it decided to exclude from the proceedings the judge who had dealt with the applicants ' action .
On CARDINAL and CARDINAL DATE respectively , the applicants modified and supplemented their action for damages .
A hearing held on DATE was adjourned until DATE in order to hear witnesses .
On DATE ORG , represented now by ORG ( GPE pro místní rozvoj ) submitted its final pleadings to the court . The applicants submitted theirs on DATE .

On DATE ORG again dismissed the applicants ' action for damages . On DATE the applicants appealed . On DATE they were invited to supplement their appeal within DATE . They substantiated the appeal on DATE .
On DATE , ORG , after a hearing on DATE , again quashed the first instance judgment insofar as it concerned ORG , and sent the case back to ORG . It upheld the remainder of the judgment .

On DATE ORG , after a hearing on DATE , delivered its third judgment by which it again dismissed the applicants ' action , this time directed only against ORG . The judgment was notified to the applicants on DATE .
On DATE ( DATE , according to ORG ) the applicants appealed substantiating their appeal on DATE . On DATE ORG submitted its observations .
On DATE ORG partly quashed the judgment of ORG and remitted the remainder of it to the first instance court .

On DATE ORG , being bound by the opinion of ORG that the applicants had suffered damage because of the erroneous action of a public authority under LAW no . TIME when they had had to pay the tax for the permanent withdrawal of their plot of land from agricultural use , and decided that GPE had to pay them CZK CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( CARDINAL EUR ) with interest for the delays in payment .
On DATE the applicants withdrew their action as to the payment of the interest on the amount of CZK CARDINAL , covering the period from DATE to DATE .

On DATE ORG , on ORG appeal of DATE , upheld ORG judgment of CARDINAL DATE , apart from the interest on the amount of CZK CARDINAL for period from DATE to DATE . ORG judgment became effective on DATE .
On DATE ORG invited the applicants to comment upon the partial withdrawal of their action . On DATE it discontinued the proceedings in this respect .
